alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:12PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dale and Coffee Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Level Plains, or near Daleville, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Level Plains, New Brockton, Clayhatchee, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Lucile, Gerald, Turner Crossroads, Lowry Mill, Central City, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Goodman and Cairns Aaf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
